about.details:
Incorporated in 1986, Suraj Estate Developers Limited is a real estate construction company. The company develops residential and commercial real estate in the South Central Mumbai region.

The company does not provide any in-house construction services and is 100% dependent on third-party contractors for the construction services of its Projects.

Suraj Estate Developers Limited has completed forty-two (42) projects in the South-Central Mumbai region.

In addition to the completed projects, the company has thirteen (13) ongoing projects and sixteen (16) upcoming projects.

The company's projects include Suraj Eleganza-II and ICICI Apartments, CCIL Bhavan (Phase-I up to 6th floor) and Tranquil Bay-I, Elizabeth Apartment and Mon Desir, St. Anthony Apartments, Lumiere and Tranquil Bay-II, Brahmsidhhi CHS, Jacob Apartments, Suraj Eleganza-I and Gloriosa Apartments and others.

As of September 30, 2023, the company, together with its subsidiaries, employed 126 permanent employees.

Suraj Estate has developed more than 10 lakh square feet of land in Mumbai. In the residential portfolio, Suraj Estate is present in the "Value Luxury' and "Luxury' segments in various price categories with unit values ranging from Rs. 10.00 million to Rs. 130.00 million.

In the commercial segment, Suraj Estate has built and sold corporate headquarters for institutional clients, namely Saraswat Cooperative Bank Limited (Prabhadevi), National Stock Exchange of India, Union Bank of India and Clearing Corporation of India Limited (Dadar).

faqs.question: What is the Suraj Estate Developers IPO?
faqs.answer:
Suraj Estate Developers IPO is a main-board IPO of 11111111 equity shares of the face value of ₹5 aggregating up to ₹400.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹360 per share. The minimum order quantity is 41.

The IPO opens on December 18, 2023, and closes on December 20, 2023.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Suraj Estate Developers IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Suraj Estate Developers IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Suraj Estate Developers IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Suraj Estate Developers IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Suraj Estate Developers IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Suraj Estate Developers IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Suraj Estate Developers IPO opens on December 18, 2023 and closes on December 20, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Suraj Estate Developers IPO?
faqs.answer: Suraj Estate Developers IPO lot size is 41, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,760.

faqs.question: How to apply for Suraj Estate Developers IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Suraj Estate Developers IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Suraj Estate Developers IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Suraj Estate Developers IPO will be done on Thursday, December 21, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, December 22, 2023. Check the Suraj Estate Developers IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Suraj Estate Developers IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Suraj Estate Developers IPO listing date is on Tuesday, December 26, 2023.
